title: Eco-Modern Duplex with Garden Oasis in Peaceful Ligota
description: Discover stylish minimalism and peaceful comfort in this airy duplex spanning a generous 165 sqm. Newly renovated from top to bottom, the home features three sunlit bedrooms and three bathrooms, with open-plan space flowing elegantly towards the private garden through energy-saving patio doors. Enjoy cozy evenings by a contemporary fireplace, and indulge in summer living with tranquil views and seamless garden access. As a resident, you benefit from shared swimming pool access in a friendly, secure community.
neighborhood_description: Set in the tranquil district of Ligota, you’ll appreciate leafy avenues, calm pathways, and abundant green spaces perfect for relaxing strolls. The neighborhood combines peaceful suburban charm with great urban links: public transport connects you swiftly with historic Katowice and shopping or dining spots nearby. With the highway a short drive away, city trips and countryside escapes are equally convenient.
key_features: patio doors opening to private garden
lifestyle_benefits: easy access to greenery and walking paths
proximity to shops and essential services
target_buyer: Ideal for retirees seeking modern comfort, energy efficiency, and a peaceful suburban lifestyle while being near health centers, local amenities, and transport links for family visits and leisure.
market_positioning: A standout option in the mid-upper segment, this property caters to buyers valuing sustainable features, up-to-date renovations, and easy but upscale living in a green, relaxed setting close to the heart of Katowice.
